content: अनक्षर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Unable to speak, mute, dumb, unlettered; मुखमनक्षरं स्वाकृतेः <ls>Bh. 2. 56.</ls> {@--2@} Unfit to be uttered. --रं [ अप्रशस्तान्यक्षराणि यत्र] Abusive language, foul or abusive words, censure. {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} Without the use of words, not expressed by words, mutely, dumbly; °रं पप्रच्छ <ls>K. 219</ls>, <ls n="K.">143</ls>; °व्यंजितदौर्हृदेन <ls>R. 14. 26.</ls>
